loans.title: Saydati Loan
loans.description: A specialized loan for productive women and home-based workers, ranging from 200 to 1,000 Bahraini Dinars. This loan helps women working from home develop their projects and products without requiring traditional collateral.
loans.details: Small loans specifically for women running home-based businesses to support and develop their projects. Loan amounts range from 200 to 1,000 BHD, repayable over 12 months.
terms: The loan must be used to support home-based or mobile businesses.
The applicant must have an existing project or a viable project idea.
The applicant must be at least 20 years old and not older than 65.
requirements: A valid copy of the smart ID card.
A copy of the passport or driver’s license.
Proof of project income or salary certificate for employees wishing to start their own projects.
Proof of residence (lease agreement, property ownership, or EWA electricity and water bill).

loans.title: Ibdaa Loan
loans.description: Supports home-based projects for men and helps develop them without requiring traditional collateral. The loan amount ranges from 200 to 1,000 Bahraini Dinars, repayable in monthly installments over a period of up to one year.
loans.details: Now, Ibdaa Bahrain offers small loans for men running home-based businesses to support and develop their projects. Loan amounts range from 200 to 1,000 BHD, repayable over 12 months.
terms: The loan must be used to support home-based or mobile businesses.
The applicant must have an existing project or a viable project idea.
The applicant must be at least 20 years old and not older than 65.
requirements: A valid copy of the smart ID card.
A copy of the passport or driver’s license.
Proof of project income or salary certificate for employees wishing to start their own projects.
Proof of residence (lease agreement, property ownership, or EWA electricity and water bill).

loans.title: Amal Loan
loans.description: Designed for clients who own a commercial, industrial, or service-based project—whether home-based, mobile, or licensed—and are ready to transition from the home-based sector to the commercial sector. Loan amounts range from 1,000 to 2,400 Bahraini Dinars.
loans.details: Now, Ibdaa Bahrain offers the Amal Loan to support commercial, service, and industrial projects under flexible terms. Loan amounts range from 1,000 to 2,400 BHD, repayable over 24 months.
terms: The loan must be used to support home-based or mobile businesses.
The applicant must have an existing project or a viable project idea.
The applicant must be at least 20 years old and not older than 65.
requirements: A valid copy of the smart ID card.
A copy of the passport or driver’s license.
Proof of project income or salary certificate for employees wishing to start their own projects.
Proof of residence (lease agreement, property ownership, or EWA electricity and water bill).

loans.title: Tamayouz Loan
loans.description: Granted to businesses with commercial registrations to help them purchase additional inventory or equipment. Loan amounts range from 1,500 to 7,000 Bahraini Dinars.
loans.details: Ibdaa Bahrain now offers the Tamayouz Loan to support licensed commercial, industrial, and service businesses under flexible terms. Loan amounts range from 1,500 to 7,000 BHD, repayable over 36 months.
terms: The applicant must have a licensed business.
The loan must be used to support working capital or purchase equipment.
The business must be at least 3 years old.
The applicant must be at least 20 years old and not older than 65.
requirements: Valid copies of passport and smart ID card.
A copy of the passport or driver’s license.
Copy of commercial registration or business license.
Proof of business income.
Business bank statement for the last six months.
The commercial registration must be valid for at least 6 more months.
Proof of residence (lease agreement, property ownership, or EWA electricity and water bill).

loans.title: Tafawoq Loan
loans.description: This loan offers flexible repayment terms designed to meet the needs of licensed business owners of both genders. It can also be granted to operators of mobile businesses such as delivery vans or taxis. Repayment periods are flexible—6, 12, 18, or 24 months.
loans.details: Ibdaa Bahrain now offers the Tafawoq Loan to support licensed commercial, industrial, and service businesses under flexible terms. Loan amounts range from 1,000 to 7,000 BHD, repayable flexibly over 6 to 24 months.
terms: The applicant must have a licensed business.
The loan must be used to support working capital or purchase equipment.
The business must be at least 3 years old.
The applicant must be at least 25 years old and not older than 65.
requirements: A valid copy of the smart ID card.
A copy of the passport or driver’s license.
Copy of commercial registration or business license.
Proof of business income.
Business bank statement for the last six months.
The commercial registration must be valid for at least 6 more months.
Proof of residence (lease agreement, property ownership, or EWA electricity and water bill).

loans.title: Seasonal Loan
loans.description: Provided to home-based or licensed commercial businesses—whether licensed or unlicensed—during seasonal events such as holidays, Ramadan, and the back-to-school season. Loan amounts range from 100 to 800 Bahraini Dinars, repayable over up to 10 months.
loans.details: With minimal administrative fees and quick, easy procedures, Ibdaa Bahrain Microfinance Company offers small business owners the opportunity to purchase additional school supplies and pay in installments over 24 months, with repayment starting after the month ends.
terms: The applicant must be at least 23 years old and not older than 60.
The applicant must have a stable and continuous source of income.
The loan must be used to purchase school supplies such as stationery, school uniforms, and related items.
requirements: A valid copy of the smart ID card.
A copy of the passport or driver’s license.
Latest salary slip for government employees.
Salary certificate for private sector employees.
Bank statement (last three months).

loans.title: Najah Loan
loans.description: The Najah Loan is specifically designed for both men and women running home-based projects who wish to develop them into licensed commercial businesses. It offers various financing amounts to meet diverse client needs, with loan amounts starting at 600 BHD and reaching up to 1,400 BHD, repayable over 18 months.
loans.details: Ibdaa Bahrain offers small loans to owners of home-based or mobile businesses to help develop and increase their working capital. Loan amounts start at 600 BHD and reach up to 1,400 BHD, repayable over 18 months.
terms: The loan must be used to support home-based or mobile businesses.
The applicant must have an existing project or a viable project idea.
The applicant must be at least 20 years old and not older than 65.
requirements: A valid copy of the smart ID card.
A copy of the passport or driver’s license.
Proof of project income or salary certificate for employees wishing to start their own projects.
Proof of residence (lease agreement, property ownership, or EWA electricity and water bill).

loans.title: Tamayouz Plus Loan
loans.description: The Tamayouz Plus Loan supports commercial, service, and industrial projects under favorable terms.
loans.details: Loan amounts range from 7,500 to 10,000 BHD. Loan term: 36 months.
terms: The loan must be used to support existing projects or to start a new one.
The applicant must be at least 25 years old and not older than 60.
The business must be at least one year old.
requirements: A valid copy of the smart ID card.
A valid copy of the passport.
Copy of commercial registration or business license.
Proof of business income.
Electricity bill for the commercial registration.
Lease agreement for the commercial registration.
Proof of stable income (in case of starting a new project).
Proof of residence (lease agreement, property ownership, or EWA electricity and water bill).
